summary: Completed comprehensive testing of GENTURIX HR Recruitment & User Management features (Iteration 9). All backend APIs (30/30 tests passed) and frontend UI flows working correctly. Full hire flow verified: create candidate -> hire -> new user can login.
passed_tests: POST /api/hr/candidates/{id}/hire - Full hire flow (creates user + guard + can login)
POST /api/hr/candidates/{id}/hire - Returns 400 for duplicate badge number
GET /api/admin/users - Admin lists users in their condo
POST /api/super-admin/condominiums/{id}/admin - Super Admin creates Condo Admin
Frontend: Reclutamiento tab shows real data from API
Frontend: Pipeline stats (Aplicaron, Entrevista, Contratados, Rechazados)
Frontend: Candidate form with all fields (name, email, phone, position, experience, notes)
Frontend: Form submission creates candidate and shows success message
Frontend: Hire dialog shows email info, badge number, hourly rate, password fields
Frontend: Hire submission creates user account with login credentials
updated_files: /app/backend/tests/test_hr_recruitment.py - Created comprehensive HR recruitment tests (30 tests)
seed_data_creation: Created TEST_ prefixed candidates and employees for testing
context_for_next_testing_agent: HR Recruitment module fully implemented and tested. Backend: Full CRUD for candidates (create, list, filter, update status, hire, reject), employee management (create directly, deactivate, activate), admin user creation (Resident, HR, Guard, Supervisor), super admin condo admin creation. Frontend: Reclutamiento tab with pipeline stats, Nuevo Candidato dialog, Contratar dialog with full hire flow. All validations working: duplicate email/badge prevention, status transitions, role-based access.

candidates_crud.create: PASS - With full_name, email, phone, position, experience_years, notes
candidates_crud.read_list: PASS - With status and position filters
candidates_crud.hire: PASS - Creates user + guard + can login

employee_management.deactivate: PASS - Sets is_active=false on guard and user
employee_management.activate: PASS - Sets is_active=true on guard and user

frontend_recruitment.reclutamiento_tab: PASS - Shows real data from API
frontend_recruitment.contratar_dialog: PASS - Opens with badge, rate, password fields
frontend_recruitment.hire_candidate: PASS - Creates user account, shows success with email

validations_tested.duplicate_email: PASS - Returns 400 'El email ya está registrado'
validations_tested.duplicate_badge: PASS - Returns 400 'El número de identificación ya está en uso'
validations_tested.already_hired: PASS - Returns 400 'Este candidato ya fue contratado'
